articles.title: Aldi launches new Lacura Beauty Advent Calendar for Â£20 - look what's inside
articles.author: Charlotte Smith
articles.summary: Aldi is launching the new 12 Days of Lacura Beauty Advent Calendar for Christmas 2025, priced at Â£19.99. The calendar includes miniature and full-size cruelty-free products from Aldi's Lacura range, featuring makeup, skincare, and haircare items. It will be available in stores starting October 26.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 5G mobile launch confirmed: Expected launch date, price in India, and more
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: OnePlus has confirmed the global launch of its flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 15 5G. Teased for an October debut in China, the phone's global release is imminent. The OnePlus 15 design features a Sand Storm color variant, aiming for a premium aesthetic.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 launch confirmed with Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 on-board
articles.author: The Hindu Bureau
articles.summary: OnePlus will launch its next flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 15, globally. The OnePlus 15 will come in a dune-coloured Sand Storm edition and will be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor. It is expected to feature a 6,000 mAh battery, a 50 MP main camera, and a 6.78 inch LTPO AMOLED display, with its release anticipated in October.

articles.title: Flytxt Recognized Again in Gartner Magic Quadrant for AI in Telecom
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Flytxt, an AI solutions company, has launched Niya-X, an Agentic AI system designed to empower CSPs with enhanced conversational, proactive, and autonomous engagement capabilities. This new product aims to minimize human intervention and optimize decision-making speed and accuracy for communication service providers, enabling them to adapt to market changes and customer demands.

articles.title: BOLDEST: Blending Art and Science in AI-Driven Business Solutions
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Prodapt has launched BOLDEST, a new venture aimed at transforming digital experiences by integrating artificial intelligence with creative design. BOLDEST provides strategic advisory services, AI-driven brand engagement, and innovative design solutions. This launch marks Prodapt's expansion into new markets.

articles.title: Kolmar Korea boosts beauty product packaging service with AI
articles.author: Ko Dong-Hwan
articles.summary: Kolmar Korea has launched an AI-powered platform, Kolmarpkg.com, designed to expedite packaging sourcing for client companies launching new beauty products. The platform analyzes product images, recommends packaging solutions from 4,000 options, and connects clients directly to manufacturers, reducing the time to market from six months to one month.

articles.title: 4 Best Hand Creams on Myntra That will Instantly Soften & Nourish Your Skin
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: The Body Shop introduces a unisex sustainable hand cream with lightweight, quick-absorbing properties and eco-friendly packaging. Plum launches BodyLovin' Vanilla Vibes Hand Cream featuring shea butter and a sweet vanilla scent for intense hydration. Brillare offers Coffee & Coconut Hand Creme containing 100% natural ingredients for deep moisturization of rough skin, while Himalaya Herbals presents Age Defying Hand Cream with herbal ingredients for mature skin, targeting fine lines.

articles.title: Best Foundations for Women â€“ High Coverage, Matte & Dewy Finish
articles.summary: IDPL features multiple makeup products offering various benefits. One product provides smooth, blemish-free coverage with niacinamide and hyaluronic acid. Other products deliver waterproof, natural-looking coverage and matte, even finish with SPF15.

articles.title: Hydrating & Tinted Lip Balms for Soft, Smooth Lips
articles.summary: IDPL introduces a new range of lip care products featuring various benefits. These include lip balms that hydrates lips with Vitamin C + E and tinted watermelon finish and moisturizes lips with olive oil, non-sticky, soft, and smooth formula. Some also repairs and hydrates lips while providing SPF 50 protection, tinted, while others protect lips with ceramides and SPF, adding subtle tinted color.

articles.title: Business News  Flytxt Mentioned as a Niche Player for Second Consecutive Year in the 2025 GartnerÂ® Magic Quadrantâ„¢ for AI in CSP Customer and Business Operations
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Flytxt, an AI provider for telecom companies, launched Niya-X, its Agentic AI system. This system enhances customer engagement by making it more conversational, proactive, and autonomous, which allows CSPs to adapt strategies and improve decision-making.

articles.title: A brighter 'G' marks Google's next chapter in the AI era
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: Google introduced a brighter, gradient version of its 'G' logo, which will now serve as the universal symbol for Google across its products, platforms, and corporate identity. This redesigned emblem, first seen in Google Search, builds on the familiar palette of blue, red, yellow, and green with sharper vibrancy, reflecting AI-powered innovation. The updated logo is gradually rolling out across Google's ecosystem after debuting in the Gemini spark in June.

articles.title: Global number one wet and dry vacuum brand Tineco launches new S7 Stretch to reach deeper and clean wider than before
articles.author: Sophie Haslett
articles.summary: Tineco has launched the FLOOR ONE S7 Stretch and FLOOR ONE S7 Stretch Deluxe vacuums, featuring a 180Â° Lay-flat Design and HyperStretch Technology. These vacuums aim to revolutionize whole-house cleaning with features like tangle-free brush heads, dual-sided edge cleaning, and FlashDry Technology for self-cleaning.

articles.title: Why AI will replace your next agent â€” for the better
articles.author: Kushmita Bose
articles.summary: Flowwow is leveraging AI to enhance personalization in the UAE's online gifting market through its upcoming ChatGPT-powered Gifting AI Assistant, which is designed to reduce search time by 30%. The recent launch of Google's AP2 also signals a shift in e-commerce ecosystems.

articles.title: AI-Washing: The new risk in brand storytelling
articles.summary: Findability Sciences launched enterprise solutions in compliance management and forecasting. The company avoided making exaggerated claims, focusing instead on measurable results like percentage improvements in accuracy and time savings in audits. This approach emphasized tangible outcomes, building credibility and trust with clients and media.

articles.title: 26 Korean Beauty Gems You'll Use To The Last Drop
articles.author: Celia Funderburk
articles.summary: Innisfree has launched a daily UV defense sunscreen SPF 36, featuring green tea, cica, and sunflower seed oil. Anua introduced a pore-clearing cleansing oil, hypoallergenic and non-irritating. Laneige offers a water sleeping mask with squalane, niacinimide, and a probiotic-derived complex and a glowy lip balm. Cosrx launched snail mucin repairing essence and Sulwhasoo has launched activating serum.

articles.title: Swiftie Sparkle Bagel at Dan's Bagels
articles.summary: Dan's Bagels is launching a limited-edition Swiftie Sparkle Bagel to celebrate the release of Taylor Swift's new album. The bagel, featuring vibrant orange and pink sugar, will be available from Sept. 30 to Oct. 5. Dan's Bagels is known for its sourdough bagels.

articles.title: Motorola Confirms The Presence Of Moto X70 Air, Ultra-Tipis Challenger Of IPhone Air
articles.summary: Motorola is set to launch the Moto X70 Air, an ultra-thin smartphone, in China at the end of October. The device features a sleek design with flat sides, physical buttons, a prominent rear camera module, and comes in a green variant with a bronze camera accent. A global launch remains a possibility.

articles.title: Flytxt mentioned as a Niche Player for Second Consecutive Year in the 2025 GartnerÂ® Magic Quadrantâ„¢ for AI in CSP Customer and Business Operations
articles.summary: Flytxt has launched Niya-X, an Agentic AI system, to empower CSPs (Communication Service Providers) to enhance customer engagement. Niya-X is designed to make customer engagement more conversational, proactive, context-aware, and autonomous, which reduces the need for human intervention and improves action speed and accuracy. The company also got recognized in the Gartner Magic Quadrant for AI in CSP Customer and Business Operations.

articles.title: Buy it in ChatGPT: OpenAI takes first step to enable chatbot users to go shopping
articles.author: Straits Times
articles.summary: OpenAI is expanding into online commerce. OpenAI is using ChatGPT for expansion.

articles.title: Guzman y Gomez releases new Caesar menu and campaign nationwide
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Guzman y Gomez (GYG) has launched its new Caesar menu, featuring the Caesar Salad, Caesar Burrito, and Caesar Cali Burrito, across all restaurants, supported by an integrated national campaign. The new menu highlights Mexican-inspired flavors and premium local produce, with the campaign emphasizing the unexpected Mexican origin of the Caesar salad.

articles.title: Even If You Hate TikTok, These 36 A+ Products Will Have You Begrudgingly Thanking The App
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Palmer's launched Cocoa Butter Tahitian Vanilla Lotion, deeply hydrating for 48 hours. Lumify Eye Drops, beloved on TikTok, instantly reduce eye redness. The Pink Stuff introduced "Sqeezy" sponge set, tackling tough cleaning projects. Eos released a limited edition Strawberry Acai Super Balm, compared to Laneige on TikTok. Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash, packed with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides for 24-hour hydration. Finally, E.l.f launched Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara, creating natural-looking, smudge-proof lash extensions.

articles.title: China's supermarket giants using storebrands to lure frugal shoppers, risking price war
articles.summary: Walmart is opening new community stores featuring its Marketside brand products. Wumart has launched budget markets in Beijing, while Freshippo is expanding its Chaohesuan NB discount chain, focusing on store brands. Aldi has doubled its China sales and is expanding into more cities.

articles.title: You Can Now Shop On ChatGPT Using 'Instant Checkout'
articles.author: BGR
articles.summary: ChatGPT introduced Instant Checkout, a feature allowing users to purchase clothes and electronics directly within their conversations. This new service streamlines the online shopping experience by eliminating the need to leave the ChatGPT interface.

articles.title: PS5 Slim Digital Edition revision replaces the glossy look with a plain matte finish, in ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: The PS5 Slim revision features a smaller SSD and replaces the glossy finish with a matte look.

articles.title: GameStop Has Exciting News for Pokemon Legends: Z-A Fans
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: GameStop will hold a nationwide midnight launch for the new game 'Pokemon Legends: Z-A'. This launch indicates the introduction of a new product by the Pokemon Company, facilitated by GameStop.

articles.title: The Trump phone is late
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: The launch of the Trump Mobile T1 smartphone, initially scheduled for September, is delayed. The phone is described as a gold-tinted, bargain basement smartphone with 'American values' and will feature a 5000mAh long life camera.

articles.title: Opendatasoft Becomes Huwise and Sets Goal of Becoming Global Leader in Data Product Marketplaces
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Opendatasoft has rebranded as Huwise. Huwise has launched its data product marketplace solution.

articles.title: LEEF Brands Launches New York Lab, 2025 Production Fully Committed
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: LEEF Brands has launched its New York extraction lab. The lab is now operational, with its 2025 production fully committed to leading partners in the state.

articles.title: Jo Malone has a lesser-known luxury perfume brand with ï¿½1 bottles available
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: John Lewis is offering shoppers the opportunity to sample seven different Jo Loves perfumes for under 1 each. This provides a low-cost trial for customers to experience the Jo Loves fragrance range.

articles.title: Call of Duty is Bringing Back Blackout in 2026
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Call of Duty: Warzone is rolling out a brand-new experience inspired by Call of Duty: Black Ops 4. This update introduces a new feature or mode to the existing Warzone platform.

articles.title: PowerWash Simulator 2 demo releases today on PC
articles.author: Shacknews
articles.summary: FuturLab is giving players access to a preview of PowerWash Simulator 2. This suggests an upcoming release or soft launch of the product, even without a firm release date yet.

articles.title: Step into Tomorrow: A Peek Inside the Future of the AI Home at LG's IFA 2025 Booth
articles.author: Brandpoint
articles.summary: LG presented its vision for future home living at IFA, showcasing the LG AI Home system with ThinQ AI, allowing appliances to connect and adapt. New products introduced include the AI-driven HeatPump WasherDryer with AI Wash technology and a new generation of smarter robot vacuums with automated capabilities. LG also introduced Spielraum, an AI mobility solution that extends the smart home into vehicles.

articles.title: Opera launches its AI-centric Neon browser
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Opera launched its AI-centric browser Neon, which allows users to create apps through AI prompts and repeatable prompts via cards. The browser has features such as a chatbot and Neon Do, enabling tasks like summarizing content and fetching details from browsing history. Select users can access Neon for $19.99 per month.
